description: long-haired white cat with three kittens (two white and one orange) peeking around her body, all with yellow eyes; black background; white silk overmat; in dark brown wood frame with silver accent; glazed; wire attached
inscription: BL, graphite: 29/100; BC, graphite: Three Kitten; BR, graphite: 1960 / [?], Test / YAMANAKA

signed: BR, within image, white pigment: Jun. Sekino
title: Cat and Three Kittens
